heroSection.title: Hey, I Am Stanislav Shevchenko, Frontend Developer
heroSection.desc: I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.

skillsSection.title: My skills
skillsSection.desc: I have experience in an extensive technology stack

items.desc: Graduated from 11 classes of school and began to be interested in development
Entered the Amur State University at the faculty of secondary vocational education with a degree in 'programming in computer systems'
Started studying web development, wrote my first mvc framework in php and based on it I made my first completed social network pet project
I tried a lot of technologies from assembler to web development, wrote several term papers in languages: C ++ and Prolog
I tried myself in gamedev at a hackathon, I made a game all by myself, but the head of the team didnâ€™t push it to the competition, since then I donâ€™t like gamedevðŸ˜¡
Seriously started doing web development, tried myself in: React, Vue, rxjs, creating spa
Graduated from college with a diploma with honors (one 4 in databases, I was too lazy to describe step by step how to write queries)
I got my first job as a frontend developer, developing a control system for a distributed control system for street billboards
Got an offer for a middle frontend developer in an outsourcing company
Entered the Blagoveshchensk Pedagogical University with a degree: 'Information Systems and Technologies'
Promoted to senior frontend developer, started in-company training, lead frontend developer on several large projects
Got a developer position at <a style='color:#46D836' href='https://happy-job.ru/'>HappyJob</a/>
I'm waiting for your offers ðŸ‘‹
